title: Name an Iconic First Person Shooter Protagonist - Game Showdown
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

There's plenty of FPS icons out there but which ones did our audience choose?

Season 2 Ep .7

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
